revised_title: The Intracranial Vascular System of Sphenodon: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: The author investigates the intracranial vascular system of Sphenodon, a reptile, using dissection and serial sections. The study provides a detailed description of the arterial and venous systems, including the internal carotid arteries, cerebral blood vessels, and the role of the saccular and superior cerebral arteries in supplying the brain and pineal gland.
